channel.title: Adding text to login screen?
channel.description:
I am currently using interface 15181 as my login interface. My last interface had text in areas, but it didn't transfer when I switched my interface. How do I add text to my new interface, how do I control where the text will be, and how do I change the size?? Thank You guys for helping!!!!
-Alpha 0nx

item.title: Adding text to login screen?
item.dc:creator: @alpha_0nx alpha 0nx
item.description:
@alpha_0nx wrote:

The interface I am currently using was preloaded into the server files.
It is NOT custom.

Read full topic
